TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UrlEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供一個使用者介面以選取 URL。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，提供一個對話方塊以選取的 URL。 is a that provides a dialog box for selecting a URL. ## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用由 方法提供的編輯器樣式，來編輯指定物件的值。

The new value of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual string Filter { get; }
.property instance string Filter
Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得編輯器的檔名篩選條件字串。

span.span: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.

summary.span: 這是用來判斷出現在對話方塊的檔案清單中的項目。

span.span: This is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.

value.span: 字串，包含有關對話方塊中可用之檔案篩選選項的資訊。

span.span: A string that contains information about the file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定篩選條件字串的所有檔案 (*。\*)。The property specifies a filter string for all files (*.\*). 篩選字串，包含一或多個篩選選項。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每個篩選選項包含描述的篩選，後面接著分隔號 (|) 和篩選模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同的篩選選項的字串會以分隔號分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 包含兩個篩選選項的篩選條件字串範例如下：The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`Text Files (*.txt)|*.txt|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Text Files (*.txt)|*.txt|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 您可以指定篩選選項中的數種篩選模式以分號區隔篩選模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 中的第一個篩選選項會指定三個篩選條件模式的篩選條件字串範例如下：The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies three filter patterns: "`Text Files(*.txt;*.text;*.lst)|*.txt;*.text;*.lst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Text Files(*.txt;*.text;*.lst)|*.txt;*.text;*.lst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
